title: ALS User Meeting
content: Presented my latest research on applying machine learning to Laue microdiffraction at the ALS user meeting.

title: ALS Doctoral Fellowship Renewal
content: Renewed my ALS doctoral fellowship to advance my research in X-ray diffraction and scattering analysis.

title: Provisional Patent Filed
content: Filed Provisional Patent Application No. 63/593,540 for a novel, prism-free beam shear distance measurement method.

title: ALS Doctoral Fellowship Awarded
content: Awarded the ALS doctoral fellowship, supported by Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, to conduct research at the ALS synchrotron facility.

title: Paper Accepted in Measurement Science and Technology
content: Published a study on the correlation between beam shear distance and step heights—achieving an axial resolution of 0.57 nm with DInM—in Measurement Science and Technology.

title: PQE Passed
content: Successfully passed the PQE, paving the way for further research on the prism-free DInM and experimental mechanics.

title: HKPFS Fellowship Awarded
content: Joined the Sherry Group at HKUST as a PhD student and was awarded the 2019/20 HKPFS (Hong Kong PhD Fellowship Scheme).
